Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add frontend build step to GitHub Actions workflow

- Install Node.js and npm dependencies
- Build React/Vite frontend before deployment
- Exclude node_modules from deployment artifact

Now frontend changes will be auto-built on push without local build

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add frontend caching and skeleton loading for faster UX

Features:
- Add dataCache.js service for frontend request caching \(5min TTL\)
- Prefetch dashboard data on login for instant tab switching
- Add skeleton loading animations for all slow pages:
  - MarketRadar, IndexOverview, FundFlowRank
  - HotConcepts, RiskAlerts
- Refresh button bypasses cache for fresh data

This improves perceived performance by showing loading skeletons
instead of blank screens, and reduces API calls via caching.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add cache warmup scheduled jobs for faster first-user experience

Schedule:
- 09:25 AM \(Mon-Fri\): Pre-warm cache 5 mins before market opens
- 13:00 PM \(Mon-Fri\): Re-warm cache before afternoon session

Warmup preloads:
- Market radar \(sectors, limit-up ladder\)
- Index overview \(major indexes\)
- Fund flow ranking
- Hot concepts

Also added manual trigger endpoint: POST /api/trigger/warmup

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
